//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   sampler2D HeightmapTexture;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float3x3 LocalToWorldMatrix;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   LocalToWorldMatrix           c7       3
//   DNEResolution                c10      1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c11      1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   HeightmapTexture             s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 2, -1, 1, 0
    def c6, 1, 0.5, 0.0625, 0
    def c14, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, -9.99999997e-007
    def c15, 15, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord1 v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v4.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed CRC32_4491AE_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    texld r0, v0, s3
    mad r0.xy, r0.zwzw, c2.x, c2.y
    dp2add r1.x, r0, -r0, c2.z
    rsq r1.x, r1.x
    rcp r0.z, r1.x
    mov r0.w, -r0.x
    dp2add r1.x, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw, c2.w
    rsq r1.x, r1.x
    mul r1.yz, r0.xwzw, r1.x
    mov r1.x, c2.w
    mul r2.xyz, r0.zxyw, r1
    mad r2.xyz, r0.yzxw, r1.yzxw, -r2
    nrm r3.xyz, v1
    dp2add_pp r4.x, r1.zyzw, r3.xzzw, c2.w
    dp3_pp r4.y, r2, r3
    dp3_pp r4.z, r0, r3
    nrm r3.xyz, v3
    dp2add_pp r1.x, r1.zyzw, r3.xzzw, c2.w
    dp3_pp r1.y, r2, r3
    dp3_pp r1.z, r0, r3
    dp3_pp r0.w, c7, r0
    dp3_pp r1.w, c8, r0
    dp3_pp r0.x, c9, r0
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, r1
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, r4
    mad_pp r2.xyz, r2.z, c2.wwxw, -r2
    texld_pp r3, c6, s0
    dp3 r0.y, v2, v2
    add r0.z, -r0.y, c2.z
    mul r4, r3.x, r0.z
    mov r5, r4
    texkill r5
    if b0
      mad r3.yz, vPos.xxyw, c10.xxyw, c10.xzww
      mul r4.xy, r3.yzzw, v4.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r5, c6.zwzw, s1
        add r0.z, -r5.y, v4.w
        mad r4.z, r5.x, r0.z, r4.x
        mov r4.xy, r4.zyzw
        mov r0.z, v4.w
      else
        mov r0.z, v4.w
      endif
      rcp r0.z, r0.z
      mul r3.yz, r0.z, r4.xxyw
      mad r3.yz, r3, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r5, r3.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r3.yzw, r5.xxyz, r5.xxyz
      mul_pp r3.yzw, r3, r3.x
    else
      mov_pp r3.yzw, r3.x
    endif
    mov_sat r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.y, -r0.y, c2.z
    pow_sat_pp r4.x, r0.y, c13.w
    mov r4.y, c6.y
    texld_pp r5, r4, s0
    abs r4.y, r1.w
    abs r4.xz, r0.wyxw
    dp3 r0.x, r4, c14
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, c12
    mov r4.z, c2.z
    add r4.xyz, r4.z, -c11
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r4
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c4.w, c4
    mov_sat_pp r0.w, r1.z
    add r1.w, r0.w, c14.w
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, c0.w
    cmp_pp r0.w, r1.w, r0.w, c2.w
    dp3_sat_pp r1.x, r2, r1
    add r1.y, r1.x, c14.w
    pow_pp r2.x, r1.x, c15.x
    mul r1.x, r2.x, c0.x
    mul_pp r1.xzw, r1.x, c5.xyyz
    cmp_pp r1.xyz, r1.y, r1.xzww, c2.w
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0.w, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r3.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r5.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c13
    cmp oC0.xyz, -r4.w, c2.w, r0
    mov oC0.w, c2.w

// approximately 102 instruction slots used (5 texture, 97 arithmetic)
